name: Accidental Pixels #3 "Star Gazing from the Belly-Earth"
description:
Accidental Pixels is a generative series where human and machine become collaborators. Scapes crafted in VR, Rendered in Blender and a glitch in Blender generates pixels according to some kind of system the human is not privy to. This chance encounter or glitch creates worlds and scapes that partly were envisioned by the human but leave room for the computer to surprise and delight the human. 

The Portrait exhibited in this scape is a 3D scan of the artist create with a Kinect scanner.
